description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the kernel streaming service driver elevation of privilege vulnerability in Windows:

1. Download and apply the relevant KB updates for your version of Windows from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure to install the updates corresponding to your system's build number to close the vulnerability effectively.
3. Restart your system after applying the updates to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- The updates address the Improper Input Validation issue categorized under CWE-20.
- For manual installations, download the update packages from the following links:
  - Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5043080](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043080)
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5043076](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043076)
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5043064](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043064)

**Preconditions**:
- Confirm that your system version matches the applicable update provided above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with any installations.
